message_history.content:
A conversation between User and Assistant. The user asks a question, and the Assistant answers it. The Assistant analyzes the given question and information in the mind, retains important relevant information, calls a search engine to find necessary information, accesses web pages with certain urls, and provides the user with the answer. The Assistant conducts search by <search> query </search>, access certain url by <access> url </access>, and the top search results and url page will be returned between <information> and </information>.  The reasoning processes are enclosed within <think> </think>. Finally, the Assistant provides answer inside <answer> and </answer>, i.e. <answer> answer here </answer>. If there are multiple queries, ensure all answers are enclosed within <answer> </answer>, seperated with comma. 

Note: the question is a valid question and you should try to find a correct answer. 

User: Please track and compile the average monthly house prices for England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland, for the period from January 2022 to April 2025 (including January 2022 and April 2025). Please cite all the statistics from government websites.

Please output the compiled data in one Markdown table format. The column names in the table should be, in order: Month, House Price in England (Pounds), House Price in Wales (Pounds), House Price in Scotland (Pounds), House Price in Northern Ireland (Pounds)
For the column 'Month', list the month in the format 2022/01, 2022/02.

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```

Assistant: 
<think>

To find the average monthly house prices for England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland from January 2022 to April 2025, I'll search through relevant government websites. </think>
<search> what is the average monthly house prices for england scotland wales and northern ireland from january 2022 to april 2025 </search>

Search query: what is the average monthly house prices for england scotland wales and northern ireland from january 2022 to april 2025
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.gov.uk/government/news/uk-house-price-index-for-january-2025):
UK House Price Index for January 2025 - GOV.UK UK house prices​​ On a non-seasonally adjusted basis, average house prices in the UK increased by 0.2% between December 2024 and January 2025, ...

[Doc 2](https://www.ons.gov.uk/economy/inflationandpriceindices/bulletins/privaterentandhousepricesuk/december2025):
Private rent and house prices, UK: December 2025 Average house prices increased to £292,000 (1.4%) in England, £211,000 (1.5%) in Wales, and £192,000 (3.3%) in Scotland, in the 12 months to ...

[Doc 3](https://landregistry.data.gov.uk/app/ukhpi/):
UK House Price Index - Land Registry As of October 2025, the average house price in the UK is £269,862, and the index stands at 103.4. Property prices have fallen by 0.1% compared to the ...

[Doc 4](https://www.nationwide.co.uk/house-price-index):
House price index | Nationwide Our calculator uses data from the index to give you a guide to the change in value of your property. These results are to give you a rough idea of house prices ...

[Doc 5](https://www.zoopla.co.uk/discover/property-news/house-price-index/):
House Price Index: December 2025 - Zoopla The average house price in the UK is £270,300 as of November 2025 (published December 2025). This is a rise of £3,050 (1.1%) over the past year.
The above documents didn't provide the exact data I'm looking for. I'll try searching for monthly data specifically.

</think>
<search> average monthly house prices england scotland wales northern ireland 2022 to 2025</search>

Search query: average monthly house prices england scotland wales northern ireland 2022 to 2025
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.ons.gov.uk/economy/inflationandpriceindices/bulletins/privaterentandhousepricesuk/december2025):
Private rent and house prices, UK: December 2025 Average house prices increased to £292,000 (1.4%) in England, £211,000 (1.5%) in Wales, and £192,000 (3.3%) in Scotland, in the 12 months to ...

[Doc 2](https://www.statista.com/statistics/285705/monthly-house-price-index-in-the-united-kingdom-uk/?srsltid=AfmBOopIf0nOAT0B0D2FC05d0pNGdVCG8aqF79RC4nejkc_gXMO-Hvf6):
Monthly house price index in the UK 2015-2025 - Statista The house price index (HPI) shows changes in the value of residential properties in England, Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland.

[Doc 3](https://landregistry.data.gov.uk/app/ukhpi/):
UK House Price Index - Land Registry As of October 2025, the average house price in the UK is £269,862, and the index stands at 103.4. Property prices have fallen by 0.1% compared to the ...

[Doc 4](https://www.ros.gov.uk/about/news/2025/uk-house-price-index-figures-for-Scotland-2025):
UK House Price Index figures for Scotland 2025 The latest HPI for Scotland shows the average price of a property in Scotland in October 2025 was £192,000, an increase of 3.3% when compared to ...

[Doc 5](https://www.zoopla.co.uk/discover/property-news/house-price-index/):
House Price Index: December 2025 - Zoopla The total value of homes sold in 2025 is £367bn, the highest since 2022. We expect the total sales to dip slightly to 1.18m in 2026. A bar chart ...
I need to find a source that provides monthly data specifically. I'll try searching for CSV or dataset links.

</think>
<search> download uk house price england wales scotland northern ireland csv</search>

Search query: download uk house price england wales scotland northern ireland csv
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.gov.uk/government/statistical-data-sets/uk-house-price-index-data-downloads-october-2025):
UK House Price Index: data downloads October 2025 - GOV.UK England revisions (CSV, 64KB). Wales revisions (CSV, 62KB). Scotland revisions (CSV, 62KB). Northern Ireland revisions (CSV, 62KB).

[Doc 2](https://landregistry.data.gov.uk/app/ukhpi/):
UK House Price Index - Land Registry If you would like to download all of the UKHPI data in comma-separated (CSV) format, please see the UK House Price Index reports page.

[Doc 3](https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/uk-house-price-index-reports):
UK House Price Index: reports - GOV.UK Reports for the UK House Price Index (UK HPI) for England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland, including in CSV format.

[Doc 4](https://landregistry.data.gov.uk/app/ukhpi/doc/ukhpi):
UK House Price Index: About - Land Registry The UK HPI dataset contains information on more than 441 areas in England, Scotland, Northern Ireland and Wales. Please note that we do not publish HPI ...

[Doc 5](https://cy.ons.gov.uk/economy/inflationandpriceindices/bulletins/housepriceindex/june2022):
UK House Price Index: June 2022 Reports for the UK House Price Index (HPI) for England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland, including in comma-separated values (CSV)format.
I'll download the CSV files and compile the data manually.
